title: Youth Development Specialist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Identity
Interview Descriptions:
I didn't even get to the interview process my second time applying to Identity because in the initial screening conversation the person I spoke with said the position that I had initially applied for was actually only half of what the job actually was. I guess it's common for them to do this in the moment and people feel the need to accept the terms and move forward with the process? They added different roles & responsibilities on the phone that the position would be responsible for which essentially sounded like a completely different job. 

A few years previously I interviewed with them for a different role in person and they were incredibly dismissive once they realized I would not be able to start the job immediately. The interviewers essentially said nothing and did not respond when I thanked them for time. It was very embarrassing and humiliating.
Interview Questions: Classic questions; how do you work on a team? How do you work through difficult situations with clients?

title: Trauma Informed Specialist Interview
Interview Descriptions: I really enjoyed this Zoom interview! Even though I did not get the position, I felt the interview process was fair and respectful. I would recommend interviewing here again soon!
Interview Questions: Describe your experience with Trauma-Informed care.
